sentences.en: “I would not have wanted to live in my parents’ or grandparents’ time,” said Mrs. Peeples, a full-time homemaker.
sentences.cn: 皮尔普斯太太现在是个全职主妇。 她说：“我不会继续活在我父母或祖父母那个时代了。

sentences.en: All she wanted to be was a mother and a homemaker.
sentences.cn: 所有她想是是母亲和主妇.

sentences.en: Emma is a price - conscious homemaker.
sentences.cn: 埃玛是个节省的家庭主妇.

sentences.en: I'm not sure Greg is much of a homemaker.
sentences.cn: 我不能确定葛瑞是不是擅长家务.

sentences.en: It eats insects and some small lizards that crawl wails -- anything the homemaker hates.
sentences.cn: 它们吃昆虫和一些在墙上 爬行 的小蜥蜴等家庭主妇所痛恨的一切生物.

sentences.en: Mom is a fulltime homemaker, and teaches Darli and I.
sentences.cn: 养母是位全职的家庭主妇.

sentences.en: Mothers have been leaving the traditional role of full - time homemaker.
sentences.cn: 母亲们已经不再扮演专职家庭主妇的传统角色.

sentences.en: My mother is usually the homemaker.
My mother was a mother, homemaker.… I think my mother influenced me as far as my love for reading.
sentences.cn: 我母亲就是一位母亲，家庭主妇……我想我母亲对我的影响很大，甚至包括我对阅读的喜爱。

sentences.en: The happy homemaker and the contented darky are both stereotypes produced by prejudice.
sentences.cn: 快乐的家庭主妇和心满意足的黑鬼都是由歧视产生的典型人物.

sentences.en: There was a doctor, a research scientist, homemaker, a businessman, and many teachers among them.
sentences.cn: 他们中间有医生 、 科学家 、 家庭主妇 、 商人, 也有很多老师.

sentences.en: This Pasadena homemaker's name is Jeanne Bell.
sentences.cn: 这家女主人的名字是吉妮·贝尔.

sentences.en: Whether you are a carpenter or a therapist, a homemaker or a professor, it makes no difference.
sentences.cn: 不论你是一个木匠或是一个治疗师，一个家庭主妇还是教授，这都没有区别。

trans.tran_cn: 料理家务者，操持家务者
trans.tran_en: a woman who works at home cleaning and cooking etc and does not have another job
